author: andreas
content: It's completely unconnected. When I processed the image in "1542 - Get What's Coming", I noticed that the black to of the image and the black background of my blog didn't work together at all, and so I added a white border. I tried it a few more times the following days, experimented with colored borders, but in the end I settled with white. Sometimes the border improves the image, sometimes it is just a fad.
